scripts.copy:vendor: mkdir -p src/vendor/preact; cp -uv node_modules/preact/LICENSE src/vendor/preact/; cp -uv node_modules/preact/dist/preact.module.js src/vendor/preact/; cp -uv node_modules/preact/hooks/dist/hooks.module.js src/vendor/preact/; sed -i 's/from"preact"/from".\/preact.module.js"/' src/vendor/preact/hooks.module.js
scripts.dev: npm run copy:vendor && web-ext run -s src --url 'about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox'
scripts.build: npm run copy:vendor && web-ext build -s src
